proof: Because $C(u) = C(v)$, there must be at least $|N(u)\Delta N(v)|$ disagreements incident to the vertices $u$ and $v$. Consequently, for any edge $uv \in \varphi_2^+$, the combined cost for $u$ and $v$ satisfies the relation $\text{cost}_C(u) + \text{cost}_C(v) \ge |N(u)\Delta N(v)| \ge \beta \cdot M_{uv}$.
